# `AuthContext`

```ts
type AuthContext = () => { user: [User](/reference/docgen/javascript/auth/types/user) | null, mfa: { ticket: string } | null, accessToken: { value: string | null, expiresAt: Date | null }, refreshTimer: { startedAt: Date | null, attempts: number, lastAttempt: Date | null }, refreshToken: { value: string | null }, errors: Partial<Record<StateErrorTypes, ErrorPayload>> }
```
